name: Shield Guy
description:
Help shield guy to collect 35 coins to win. Be careful there are enemies around and a shield is not the most offensive weapon. All shield guy can do is push his enemies away or block their attacks.

Some coins might seem to high to jump up to. If there only was a way to get more height...

Space - Jump

Left Click - Parry

Right Click - Block

Esc - Pause game

Try to collect the coins as fast as possible and win the game in the fastest time.

You can use the block action to gain additional speed from enemies.
